medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient has been experiencing abdominal pain localized in the right lower quadrant for 3 days. The abdominal pain was initially accompanied by severe nausea and vomiting (9 times). After an initial evaluation, the pain persisted but without further nausea, vomiting, fever, or chills.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Personal history of pulmonary embolism, s/p anticoagulation for 6 months.
